fields.title: Data Science Supervisor
fields.description: Supervised a team of interns on machine learning and analytics projects, improving model accuracy and data quality. Designed internship programs aligned with company goals, increasing project delivery efficiency by 20%. Guided data teams through the full ML pipeline (data prep → analysis → model deployment). Expanded mentoring by introducing hands-on workshops for new hires, boosting onboarding speed.

fields.title: Tech Course Content Creator
fields.description: Developed and published structured course materials on Generative AI, Data Science, and Machine Learning, reaching 500+ learners. Integrated cutting-edge AI trends to ensure course relevance and learner career readiness. Collaborated with educators to align training content with job-market needs, producing practical assignments and interactive exercises.

fields.title: Data Science Mentor
fields.description: Mentored 30+ students in Python, ML fundamentals, and applied analytics. Created tailored learning paths, boosting participant retention and confidence in technical skills. Developed sample projects and guided students to implement real-world datasets, reinforcing applied learning.

fields.title: Organizer/Mentor
fields.description: Facilitated community workshops on Python, ML, and AI concepts with 250+ participants. Led projects applying data science to real-world challenges (education, local business). Organized interactive coding sessions and competitions to engage attendees and showcase practical skills.

fields.title: Lead
fields.description: Organized tech workshops and events that introduced 200+ women to careers in AI and Data Science. Built an online knowledge-sharing community, growing engagement by 40%. Provided mentorship and guidance for attendees to start their first projects in Python and ML.

fields.title: Assistant Program Manager
fields.description: Coordinated leadership and digital literacy programs that reached 200+ young women. Launched digital literacy workshops, equipping participants with core tech and online safety skills. Introduced mini-projects and exercises to reinforce learning outcomes and practical skills.
